name: The Queen of Versailles
tagline: A documentary that follows a billionaire couple as they begin construction on a mansion inspired by Versailles. During the next two years, their empire, fueled by the real estate bubble and cheap money, falters due to the economic crisis.

name: Club Fed
tagline: A gangster's girlfriend is framed and sent to a minimum-security prison.

name: Kalifornia
tagline: A journalist duo go on a tour of serial killer murder sites with two companions, unaware that one of them is a serial killer himself.

name: Backbeat
tagline: A dramatization of the Hamburg, Germany phase of the Beatles' early history.

name: Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter... and Spring
tagline: On an isolated lake, an old monk lives on a small floating temple. The wise master has also a young boy with him who learns to become a monk. And we watch as seasons and years pass by.

name: I'm in Love with a Church Girl
The Dancer Upstairs
tagline: A police detective in a South American country is dedicated to hunting down a revolutionary guerilla leader.

name: Pieces of April
tagline: A wayward daughter invites her dying mother and the rest of her estranged family to her apartment for Thanksgiving dinner.

name: Bon voyage
tagline: An actress, a writer, a student, and a government worker band together in an effort to escape Paris as the Nazis move into the city.

name: Megaforce
tagline: Story about a rapid deployment defense unit that is called into action whenever freedom is threatened.

name: At Close Range
tagline: In 1978 rural Pennsylvania an absentee father is reacquainted with his estranged teenage sons and they become intrigued with romanticized life of crime.

name: Redbelt
tagline: A fateful event leads to a job in the film business for top mixed-martial arts instructor Mike Terry. Though he refuses to participate in prize bouts, circumstances conspire to force him to consider entering such a competition.

name: Double Dragon
tagline: Two brothers have half of a powerful ancient Chinese talisman. An evil gang leader has the other half, and determines to get the brothers' half and have a complete medallion so he can gain absolute power.

name: No
tagline: An ad executive comes up with a campaign to defeat Augusto Pinochet in Chile's 1988 referendum.

name: Layer Cake
tagline: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

name: Bucky Larson: Born to Be a Star
tagline: A kid from the Midwest moves out to Hollywood in order to follow in his parents footsteps -- and become a porn star.

name: Weeds
tagline: A San Quentin inmate, sentenced to life without paroll, writes a play that catches the interest of a reporter.

name: Trance
tagline: An art auctioneer who has become mixed up with a group of criminals partners with a hypnotherapist in order to recover a lost painting.

name: White Hunter Black Heart
tagline: A thinly fictionalized account of a legendary movie director, whose desire to hunt down an animal turns into a grim situation with his movie crew in Africa.

name: Journey to the South Pacific
tagline: An underwater voyage to Indonesia to learn about its inhabitants such as giant rays and whale sharks as well as efforts being made in the region for ocean conservation.

name: Shanghai Triad
tagline: A provincial boy related to a Shanghai crime family is recruited by his uncle into cosmopolitan Shanghai in the 1930s to be a servant to a ganglord's mistress.

name: 42nd Street
tagline: A producer puts on what may be his last Broadway show, and at the last moment a chorus girl has to replace the star...

name: Princess Mononoke
tagline: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

name: Sky Bandits
tagline: Through a series of circumstances, a pair of Old West gunfighters end up as fighter pilots in World War I.

name: Dancing at Lughnasa
tagline: Five unmarried sisters make the most of their simple existence in rural Ireland in the 1930s.

name: Waltz with Bashir
tagline: An Israeli film director interviews fellow veterans of the 1982 invasion of Lebanon to reconstruct his own memories of his term of service in that conflict.

name: The Company
tagline: Ensemble drama centered around a group of ballet dancers, with a focus on one young dancer (Campbell) who's poised to become a principal performer.

name: The Nasty Girl
tagline: When a young woman investigates her town's Nazi past, the community turns against her.

name: The Fall
tagline: In a hospital on the outskirts of 1920s Los Angeles, an injured stuntman begins to tell a fellow patient, a little girl with a broken arm, a fantastic story of five mythical heroes. Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality blurs as the tale advances.

name: Noises Off...
tagline: A travelling theater group find so much action going on behind-the-scenes, they almost ruin the performances.

name: A Brief History of Time
tagline: A film about the life and work of the cosmologist, Stephen Hawking, who despite his near total paralysis, is one of the great minds of all time.

name: Author! Author!
tagline: While facing the stress of his play being produced on Broadway, a playwright deals with having to raise his son, his stepdaughters, and his stepsons.

name: Nomads
tagline: A French anthropologist moves to Los Angeles and is followed by the evil spirits of an extinct tribe he once uncovered.

name: Adam
tagline: Adam, a lonely man with Asperger's Syndrome, develops a relationship with his upstairs neighbor, Beth.

name: Riding Giants
tagline: Documentary detailing the origins and history of surf culture.

name: The Valet
tagline: A porter and a top-model have to pretend to be a couple in order to salvage a CEO's marriage.

name: The East
tagline: An operative for an elite private intelligence firm finds her priorities changing dramatically after she is tasked with infiltrating an anarchist group known for executing covert attacks upon major corporations.

name: Sleepwalk with Me
tagline: A burgeoning stand-up comedian struggles with the stress of a stalled career, a stale relationship, and the wild spurts of severe sleepwalking he is desperate to ignore.

name: Sing
tagline: A teen film about an Italian punk forced to work with an innocent Jewish girl.

name: The Dish
tagline: A remote Australian antenna, populated by quirky characters, plays a key role in the first Apollo moon landing.

name: It Happened at the World's Fair
Touch of Evil
tagline: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

name: The Illusionist
tagline: A French illusionist finds himself out of work and travels to Scotland, where he meets a young woman. Their ensuing adventure changes both their lives forever.

name: The Squeeze
tagline: A mysterious black box spells danger to a con man and female detective.

name: DysFunktional Family
tagline: Documentary on comedian Eddie Griffin who heads back home to a family reunion, which includes two uncles - one a porn director and the other an ex-pimp.

name: The White Ribbon
tagline: Strange events happen in a small village in the north of Germany during the years just before World War I, which seem to be ritual punishment. The abused and suppressed children of the villagers seem to be at the heart of this mystery.

name: Rabbit Hole
tagline: Life for a happy couple is turned upside down after their young son dies in an accident.

name: Def by Temptation
tagline: An evil succubus is preying on libidinous black men in New York, and all that stands in her way is a minister-in-training, an aspiring actor, and a cop that specializes in cases involving the supernatural.

name: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
tagline: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.

name: Shattered Glass
tagline: The true story of a young journalist who fell from grace when it was found he had fabricated over half of his articles.

name: Transsiberian
tagline: A Trans-Siberian train journey from China to Moscow becomes a thrilling chase of deception and murder when an American couple encounters a mysterious pair of fellow travelers.

name: The Host
tagline: A monster emerges from Seoul's Han River and focuses its attention on attacking people. One victim's loving family does what it can to rescue her from its clutches.

name: Once Were Warriors
tagline: A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.

name: But I'm a Cheerleader
tagline: A naive teenager is sent to rehab camp when her straitlaced parents and friends suspect her of being a lesbian.

name: Blue Is the Warmest Color
tagline: Adele's life is changed when she meets Emma, a young woman with blue hair, who will allow her to discover desire, to assert herself as a woman and as an adult. In front of others, Adele grows, seeks herself, loses herself and ultimately finds herself through love and loss.

name: Rang De Basanti
tagline: A young woman from England comes to India to make a documentary about her grandfather's diary which was written in the 1920s about the Indian Independence with five young men.

name: Chinese Box
tagline: The story of Hong Kong, from New Year's Day to June 30th, 1997, when the British left their colony and turned it over to the People's Republic of China.

name: Krrish 3
tagline: Krrish and his scientist father have to save the world and their own family from an evil man named Kaal and his team of human-animal mutants led by the ruthless Kaya. Will they succeed? How?

name: Russkies
tagline: A group of American boys and a shipwrecked Russian sailor become friends in the midst of the Cold War.

name: Bamboozled
tagline: A frustrated African American TV writer proposes a blackface minstrel show in protest, but to his chagrin it becomes a hit.

name: Oldboy
tagline: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.

name: Bird
tagline: The troubled life and career of the jazz musician, Charlie "Bird" Parker.

name: Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues
tagline: With the 70s behind him, San Diego's top rated newsman, Ron Burgundy, returns to take New York's first 24-hour news channel by storm.
